verses.roman:
śivānanda-senera putra 'kavi-karṇapūra'
'rūpera milana' sva-granthe likhiyāchena pracura

synonyms: śivānanda-senera—of Śivānanda Sena; putra—the son; kavi-karṇapūra—Kavi-karṇapūra; rūpera milana—meeting Rūpa Gosvāmī; sva-granthe—in his own book; likhiyāchena pracura—has written profusely.
translation: In his book Caitanya-candrodaya, Kavi-karṇapūra, the son of Śivānanda Sena, has elaborately described the meeting between Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
